Class Global

java.lang.Object
Global
public class Global extends Object
This is the Global class which holds most of the static variables and methods
Version:
final
Author:
Harry Wu

  • Method Details

    • restartMusic

      public static void restartMusic(String musicLocation) throws LineUnavailableException, IOException, UnsupportedAudioFileException
      This method stops the playing music and starts a new one
      Parameters:
      musicLocation - the path to the music
      Throws:
      LineUnavailableException - unable to read file
      IOException - unable to read file
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - unable to read file
